thread.title: Cops: 12-year-old LI girl's condition 'grave' after shooting
thread.title_full: Cops: 12-year-old LI girl's condition 'grave' after shooting - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Cops: 12-year-old LI girl's condition 'grave' after shooting
text:
HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) - Police say a 12-year-old girl was shot in the head while in the living room of her family's home on Long Island.
Nassau County police say it happened around 5 p.m. in Hempstead.
Investigators believe someone on the street in front of the two-story home opened fire.
A single bullet went through a plate-glass window and struck the girl in the head.
Det. Sgt. James Skopek says the girl, whose name was not released, remains hospitalized. He says her condition is "grave."
Skopek told reporters that detectives are pursuing multiple leads. He said it was too early in the investigation to know if the girl was targeted.
The girl's parents were also inside the home, but were not injured.
Police are continuing to investigate. No arrests have been made.
